name: GitBase12
title: GitBase - Open Source Dynamic Website CMS Without Database
description: A Next.js site with Tailwind & Shadcn/UI, using GitHub API for content management. No database needed for dynamic updates.
slogan: Open Source Dynamic Website CMS Without Database
intro: GitBase is a dynamic, database-free website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/UI, featuring a content management system powered by the GitHub API for seamless updates and administration.
author: GitBase
